data.caption: Intimation Of Receipt Of Approval For The Listing And Trading Of Equity Shares Of  Chembond Chemicals Limited (Formerly Chembond Chemical Specialties Limited) On BSE Limited (BSE) And The National Stock Exchange Of India Limited (NSE).
data.news_body: In pursuance of the letter of even date received from Chembond Chemicals Limited (CCL) (copy attached) we hereby inform you that CCL has received approval for Listing and Trading of its equity shares on BSE Limited (BSE) and the National Stock Exchange of India Limited (NSE). The equity shares of the CCL will be available for trading on both exchanges from Wednesday July 23 2025.

data.caption: Intimation On Behalf Of Chembond Chemicals Limited (Formerly Chembond Chemical Specialties Limited) Pursuant To Regulation 29 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: In pursuance of the letter of even date received from Chembond Chemicals Limited (CCL) (copy attached) we hereby disseminate this information on their behalf that a meeting of the Board of Directors of CCL is scheduled to be held on Saturday July 26 2025 to consider approved and take on record the Unaudited Financial Results on Standalone and Consolidated basis for the quarter ended June 30 2025 (Q 1).

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Meeting Of Board Of Directors Of The Company Pursuant To Regulation 29 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
Chembond Material Technologies Ltd-has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 25/07/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 29 and other applicable regulations if any of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled to be held on Friday July 25 2025 inter-alia to consider approve and take on record the Unaudited Financial Results on Standalone and Consolidated basis for the quarter ended June 30 2025 (Q1).

Further pursuant to our letter Ref. No. SE/CS/2025-26/28 dated June 23 2025 and in terms of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 and the Companys internal code of conduct for prevention of Insider Trading the Trading window for dealing in securities of the Company will remain closed for Directors / Officers / Designated persons of the Company till 48 hours post the outcome of board meeting i.e. till Sunday July 27 2025. The Trading window shall re-open on July 28 2025.

data.caption: Communication Received From Chembond Chemicals Limited (Formerly Chembond Chemical Specialties Limited) Regarding Newspaper Advertisement Of Information Memorandum In Connection To The Listing Of 26896576 Equity Shares.
data.news_body: In furtherance to our letter bearing reference number SE/CS/2025-26/39 dated July 14 2025 and letter received from Chembond Chemicals Limited (CCL) of even date thereby informing about the advertisement published regarding Infromation Memorandum in connection to the listing of 26896576 Equity shares of CCL in "Hamara Mahanagar" (Hindi Newspaper) dated July 17 2025 (enclosed herewith as Annexure A) we hereby disseminate information on their behalf.

data.caption:
Communication Received From Chembond Chemicals Limited (Formerly Known As Chembond
Chemical Specialties Limited) Regarding:
(I) Its Change Of Name; And
(Ii) Listing Of Its Equity Shares On The Stock Exchanges Viz. BSE Limited And National Stock Exchang
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that Chembond Chemicals Limited (formerly known as Chembond Chemical Specialties Limited) ("CCL") have informed the Company vide letter dated June 25 2025 following : 
i) Their Companys name stand changed from Chembond Chemical Specialties Limited to Chembond Chemicals Limited effective from June 24 2025; and 
ii) They have received in-principle approval in relation to listing of their equity shares from BSE Limited and National Stock Exchange of India Limited on June 23 2025 and June 24 2025 respectively.

data.caption: Additional Details Required For Corporate Announcement Filed Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015.
data.news_body: Attached herewith additional details required for Corporate Announcement filed under Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to BSE Circular No. LIST/COMP/01/2019-20 dated April 02 2019 NSE Circular No. NSE/CML/2019/11 dated April 02 2019 and in accordance with the Internal Code of Conduct for Regulating Monitoring and Reporting of Trades of Chembond Material Technologies Limited (formerly known as Chembond Chemicals Limited) ("the Company") read with applicable provisions of the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulation 2015 the trading Window shall remain closed from 1st July 2025 till 48 hours of declaration of Standalone & Consolidated financial results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2025 ("the Financial Results").

data.caption: Additional Details Required For Corporate Announcement Filed Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015.
data.news_body:
This is in furtherance to the outcome of Board Meeting submitted by Company bearing ref. no. SE/CS/2025-26/23 dated May 30 2025 and your email received dated June 02 2025 for additional details required under SEBI circular dated October 18 2019 for Corporate Announcement filed under Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 - Resignation of Statutory Auditors. 
Please find attached herewith Annexure - A regarding information of Resignation of Auditor as per SEBI circular dated October 18 2019.
Please take the above information on record.

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board to consider Dividend
data.news_body: The Board in their meeting held on 30th May 2025 has considered and approved Dividend of Rs. 1.75/- (35%) per equity shares of having face value of Rs. 5/- each for the FY 24-25.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 30Th May 2025
data.news_body:
we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today has:
1. considered and approved the Audited Financial Statements (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter / year ended 31st March 2025
2. recommended Dividend of Rs.1.75/- (Rupee One and Paisa Seventy Five only) (35%) per equity share of face value of Rs. 5/- each fully paid-up for the financial year ended March 31 2025.
and any other matters as mentioned in Covering letter.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change of Company Name
data.news_body:
This is in furtherance to our earlier bearing ref no. SE/CS/2025-26/13 dated May 3 2025 thereby informing the effective date of the Scheme.
In furtherance to the above we are pleased to inform you that a fresh "Certificate of Incorporation consequent upon Change of Name" (pursuant to Rule 29 of the Companies (Incorporation) Rules 2014) of the Company from "Chembond Chemicals Limited" to "Chembond Material Technologies Limited" in terms of Clause 42.1 of above Scheme has been issued by the Registrar of Companies Mumbai Maharashtra effective from May 27 2025. Copy of the fresh Certificate of Incorporation is enclosed for your information and record.
The name of the Company thus stands changed to "Chembond Material Technologies Limited" from May 27 2025 and the Memorandum and Articles of Association of the Company stands amended accordingly.
Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Regarding Rescheduling Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Chembond Chemicals Ltd-has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 30/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve In furtherance to the earlier announcement bearing ref. no. SE/CS/2025-26/16 dated May 19 2025 pursuant to the provisions of the Securities Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations 2015 this is to inform you that due to unavoidable circumstances the Meeting of Board of Directors which was scheduled to be held on Saturday May 24 2025 will now be held on Friday May 30 2025.

Further pursuant to our letter Ref. No. SE/CS/2024-25/66 dated March 26 2025 and in terms of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 and the Companys internal code of conduct for prevention of Insider Trading the Trading window for dealing in securities of the Company will remain closed for Directors / Officers / Designated persons of the Company till 48 hours post the outcome of board meeting i.e. till Sunday June 1 2025. The Trading window shall re-open on Monday June 2 2025.

data.descriptor: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure
data.caption: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure A
data.news_body:
Format of Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate.

Sr. No. Particulars Details
1Name of CompanyChembond Chemicals Ltd-
2CIN NO.L24100MH1975PLC018235
3 Outstanding borrowing of company as on 31st March / 31st December as applicable (in Rs cr) 0.00
4Highest Credit Rating during the previous FY BBB+
4aName of the Credit Rating Agency issuing the Credit Rating mentioned in (4)CRISIL LTD.
5Name of Stock Exchange# in which the fine shall be paid in case of shortfall in the required borrowing under the frameworkBSE


We confirm that we are a Large Corporate as per the applicability criteria given under the SEBI circular SEBI/HO/DDHS/CIR/P/2018/144 dated November 26 2018. No



Name of the Company Secretary: Suchita Singh
Designation: COMPANY SECRETARY
EmailId: cs@chembondindia.com
Name of the Chief Financial Officer: Rashmi Sameer Gavli
Designation: CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER
EmailId: rashmi.gavli@chembondindia.com

Date: 25/04/2025

Note: In terms para of 3.2(ii) of the circular beginning F.Y 2022 in the event of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt securities a fine of 0.2% of the shortfall shall be levied by Stock Exchanges at the end of the two-year block period. Therefore an entity identified as LC shall provide in its initial disclosure for a financial year the name of Stock Exchange to which it would pay the fine in case of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt markets.

data.news_body: The Record Date arrived in consultation with Chembond Chemical Specialties Limited ("Resulting Company") for determining the shareholders of Company who shall be issued and allotted the shares of Resulting Company under the Scheme will be Friday May 9 2025.

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.news_body: Certificate under Regulation 74(5) of the Securities and Exchange of Board of India (Depositories and Participants) Regulations 2018 for the quarter ended March 31 2025.

data.caption: Intimation Of Closure Of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to BSE Circular No. LIST/COMP/01/2019-20 dated April 02 2019 NSE Circular No. NSE/CML/2019/11 dated April 02 2019 and in accordance with the Internal Code of Conduct for Regulating Monitoring and Reporting of Trades of Chembond Chemicals Limited ("the Company") read with applicable provision of the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulation 2015 the Trading Window for dealing  in securities of the Company by Designated Person shall remain closed from 1st April 2025 til 48 hours of the declaration of Standalone & Consolidated Audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2025 ("Financial Results").

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: Intimation of completion of tenure of Mrs. Saraswati Sankar as an Independent Director of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Intimation of completion of tenure of Mrs. Saraswati Sankar as an Independent Director of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Retirement
data.news_body: Intimation of completion of tenure of Mrs. Saraswati Sankar as an Independent Director of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body:
Appointment of Mrs. Gorsi A. Parekh (DIN:00343194) as an Additional Director (Non-Executive Independent) of the Company for a term of 5 years fron date of appointment 22nd March 2025 to 21st March 2030.
Appointment of Mr. Mayank P. Shah (DIN:01655046) as an Additional Director (Non-Executive Independent) of the Company for a term of 5 years from date of appointment 22nd March 2025 to 21st March 2030.
Pursuant to the provisions of Section 110 of the Companies Act 2013 the Board also approved the Postal Ballot Notice to be sent to Shareholders for obtaining their approval with respect to the above appointments and other matters.

data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Appointment Of Director
data.news_body:
Appointment of Mrs. Gorsi A. Parekh (DIN:00343194) as an Additional Director (Non-Executive Independent) of the Company for a term of 5 years from date of appointment 22nd March 2025 to 21st March 2030.
Appointment of Mr. Mayank P. Shah (DIN:01655046) as an Additonal Director (Non-Executive Independent) of the Company for a term of 5 years from date of appointment 22nd March 2025 to 21st March 2030.
Pursuant to provisions of Section 110 of the Companies Act 2013 the Board aslo approved the Postal Ballot Notice to be sent to shareholders for obtaining their approval with respect to the above appointments and other matters.

data.caption: Update On Composite Scheme Of Arrangement
data.news_body: In connection to Composite Scheme of Arrangement we would like to inform you that Company has dispatched Option Forms I  to all physical shareholders requesting them to convert their physical shares into demat form and submit the details of their demat account at least 7 days prior to the Record date. The Record date will be communicated to shareholders and Stock Exchange(s) in due course after receipt of order copy from Honble NCLT.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Scheme of Arrangement
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we would like to inform you that the Honble National Company Law Tribunal Mumbai Branch ("Honble NCLT") in its meeting held on March 7 2025 has reserved the order in the matter of Composite Scheme of Arrangement.
A copy of the order passed by the NCLT is yet to be made available and Company is in process of availing certified true copy of NCLT order once it is made available we will submit the same with stock exchange(s).
The scheme will be effective upon filing of the certified copy of order of the Honble NCLT sanctioning the scheme with the Registrar of Companies Mumbai.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Submission of Corrigendum Newspaper Advertisement published in Marathi Newspaper.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Please find enclosed newspaper publication for your record.

data.caption: Approval Of Unaudited (Standalone And Consolidated) Financial Statements For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31St December 2024
data.news_body:
In continuation to our letter bearing Ref. no. SE/CS/2024-25/56 dated 16th January 2025 and pursuant to Regulation 33 30 and other applicable regulations if any of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company in its meeting held today considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidted) for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2024 which are enclosed along with the Limited Review Report.

The meeting of Audit Committee/ Board of Directors of the Company commenced at 10.45 a.m. and concluded at 2 p.m.

data.caption: Approval Of The Unaudited (Standalone And Consolidated) Financial Statements For Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September, 2024
data.news_body: In continuation to our letter bearing Ref. no. SE/CS/2024-25/43 dated 17th October, 2024, and pursuant to Regulation 33, 30 of SEBI(LODR), Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company in its meeting held today considered and approved inter alia: 1. the Unaudited Financials Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2024 which are enclosed, along with the Limited Review Report. 2. the Notice convening the Meeting of the Equity Shareholders of the Company to be held on Friday, 6th December, 2024 at 11:00 a.m. (IST) through Audio/Video conferencing, pursuant to the directions of the NCLT, Mumbai Bench vide Order dated 11th October, 2024. The notice of the said meeting will be issued to shareholders holding shares as on 25th October, 2024.

data.caption: Results - Financial Results For The Financial Year Ended March 31, 2024
data.news_body: Dear Sir,Pursuant to Regulation 33, 30 and other applicable regulations, if any, of the SEBI LODR we would like to inform that the Board of Directors at its meeting held today:a. Considered and approved the Audited Financial Statements (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter / year ended 31st March 2024 along with the Auditor''s Report thereon.Further, we would like to inform you that Bathiya and Associates LLP, Chartered Accountants, Statutory Auditors have issued Audit Reports with unmodified opinion. b. data.caption: Results - Financial Results For The Financial Year Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulations 33, 30 and other applicable regulations, if any, of the SEBI LODR we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today:
a) Considered and approved the Audited Financial Statement (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter / year ended 31st March 2023 which are enclosed herewith along with the Auditors' Report on the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statement.
Further, we would like to inform you that Bathiya & Associates, LLP, Statutory Auditors have issued Audit Reports with unmodified opinion on the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2023.
b) Recommended Dividend of Rs.3.00 per equity share for the fy ended 31st March, 2023 subject to the approval of the members in the ensuing AGM.
c) Re-appointed M/s. Bathiya and Associates LLP, (Firm Registration No. 101046W/W100063) as Statutory Auditors of the Company for a term of 5 years.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 23(9) Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations') For The Six Months Ended 31St March, 2022
data.news_body: Pursuant to the Regulation 23(9) of the Listing Regulations read with SEBI Circular No. SEBI/ HO/CFD/CMD1/CIR/P/2021/662 dated 22nd November, 2021, please find enclosed herewith the disclosure of Related Party Transactions (RPT) on a consolidated basis, in the format specified under the stated circular for the half year ended 31st March, 2022.The Company has made the disclosure on Related Party Transactions of the Company, in XBRL mode, on May 28, 2022. Since new SEBI format for XBRL filing is yet to be released by the Exchanges, we are filing the RPT disclosure as per new SEBI format in PDF mode. We request you to kindly ignore the xbrl filing and take this pdf on record.Request you to take the above information on your records.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter / Year Ended 31St March, 2022.
data.news_body:
In continuation to our letter bearing Ref. no. SE/CS/2022-23/12 dated 4th May, 2022, and pursuant to Regulations 33, 30 and other applicable regulations, if any, of the SEBI LODR Regulations, we have to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today,

a) Considered and approved the Audited Financial Statement (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter / year ended 31st March 2022 which are enclosed herewith along with the Auditors' Report on the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statement.

Further, we would like to inform you that Bathiya & Associates, LLP, Chartered Accountants, Statutory Auditors have issued Audit Reports with unmodified opinion on the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2022.
b) Recommended Dividend of Rs.5.00 (Rupees Five only) per equity share for the financial year ended 31st March, 2022 subject to the approval of the members in the ensuing AGM.

data.news_body:

No. SE/CS/2021-22/44 dated 30th December, 2021 & in terms of SEBI (PIT) Regulations, 2015 & the Company's internal code of conduct, for prevention of Insider Trading, the Trading window for dealing in securities of the Company will remain closed for Directors/ Officers/ Designated persons of the Company till 48 hours post the outcome of board meeting i.e. till 21st January, 2022.

data.caption: Rectification In The Standalone Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March, 2021
data.news_body: Company vide its letter bearing ref. no. SE/CS/2021-22/12 dated 15th May, 21 submitted the audited financial results Standalone & Consolidated for the quarter & year ended 31st March, 21. It has come to our notice that in the standalone audited financial results under the heading Tax expense we missed to consider a row with heading 'Tax in respect of earlier years' amounting to Rs.0.56 lakhs for the quarter / year ended 31st March, 21. Resultantly, the Profit After Tax & Total Comprehensive Income standalone for the quarter / year ended 31st March, 21 has changed to that effect.We submit herewith the rectified Standalone Audited Financial Results & Consolidated Audited Financial Results for the Quarter / Year ended 31st March, 21 for your reference & record.We hereby confirm that apart from the above there is no change and / or revision in the standalone & consolidated financial results for the quarter & year ended 31st March, 21 submitted earlier.

data.caption: Financial Results For 31St March, 2021
data.news_body:
This is in continuation to our letter bearing Ref. no. SE/CS/2021-22/10 dated 5th May, 2021, and pursuant to Regulations 33, 30 and other applicable regulations, if any, of the SEBI (LODR), 2015, (the Listing Regulations), we have to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company in its meeting held todConsidered and approved the Audited Financial Statement (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter / year ended 31st March 2021 which are enclosed herewith along with the Auditors' Report on the Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statement.
Declaration on Audit Report with unmodified opinion
We declare that the Auditors' Report on Standalone and Consolidated Annual Financial Statement for the year ended 31st March 2021, is with unmodified opinion.
b) Recommended Dividend of Rs. 2.25 (Rupees Two and Twenty Five Paise) per equity share for the financial year ended 31st March, 2021 subject to the approval of the members in the ensuing Annual General Meeting (AGM).

data.caption: OUTCOME OF BOARD MEETING
data.news_body:
This is in continuation to our letter bearing Ref. no. SE/CS/2021-22/10 dated 5th May, 2021 & pursuant to Regulations 33, 30 and other applicable regulations, if any, of the SEBI (LODR), 2015, (the Listing Regulations), we have to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company in its meeting held today, Considered & approved the Audited Financial Statement (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter / year ended 31st March 2021 which are enclosed herewith along with the Auditors' Report on the Standalone & Consolidated Financial Statement.
Declaration on Audit Report with unmodified opinion We declare that the Auditors' Report on Standalone & Consolidated Annual Financial Statement for the year ended 31st March 2021, is with unmodified opinion.
Recommended Dividend of Rs. 2.25 per equity share for the financial year ended 31st March, 2021 subject to the approval of the members in the ensuing AGM.

data.caption: OUTCOME OF BOARD MEETING
data.news_body:
This is in continuation to our letter bearing Ref. no. SE/CS/2021-22/10 dated 5th May, 2021 & pursuant to Regulations 33, 30 and other applicable regulations, if any, of the SEBI (LODR), 2015, (the Listing Regulations), we have to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company in its meeting held today, Considered & approved the Audited Financial Statement (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter / year ended 31st March 2021 which are enclosed herewith along with the Auditors' Report on the Standalone & Consolidated Financial Statement.
Declaration on Audit Report with unmodified opinion We declare that the Auditors' Report on Standalone & Consolidated Annual Financial Statement for the year ended 31st March 2021, is with unmodified opinion.
Recommended Dividend of Rs. 2.25 per equity share for the financial year ended 31st March, 2021 subject to the approval of the members in the ensuing AGM.
